triples.name: Motion planning
triples.relevance: The paper presents a novel motion planning approach as its core contribution for automated vehicle trajectory planning.

triples.name: Vehicular automation
triples.relevance: The paper addresses trajectory planning for automated vehicles, a key component of vehicular automation systems.

triples.name: Reachability analysis
triples.relevance: The paper combines set-based reachability analysis as a core methodological component of its motion planning approach.

triples.name: Convex optimization
triples.relevance: The paper integrates convex optimization techniques with reachability analysis to solve the trajectory planning problem.

triples.name: Benchmark
triples.relevance: The paper validates its approach using scenarios from the CommonRoad benchmark suite for trajectory planning.
